summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North Forty-third and East Forty-third, from Stone Avenue to Brooklyn Avenue et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing under Ordinance No. 13971, creating Local Improvement District No. 1279 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
